comments.body: I'm wondering if we should separate grpc and json-api by commands (or another way of grouping arguments in `scopt`). IIUC e.g. the tls config is unused when using the json-api.

Yeah the CLI UX is a bit shitty atm. There is also other stuff like the port argument which is a bit weird, really you want a `--url` argument here. Iâ€™ll leave it for now but we definitely need to improve that. Happy to hear suggestions for what a good UX is.
